abstract: The company reported that net income fell 8 percent to $1.8 billion, or 33 cents a share, from the same quarter a year ago, somewhat better than analysts had expected.
snippet: The company reported that net income fell 8 percent to $1.8 billion, or 33 cents a share, from the same quarter a year ago, somewhat better than analysts had expected.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — John T. Chambers, chief executive of Cisco Systems, said Wednesday that he had largely completed the task of reshaping the company, a maker of the gear that runs the Internet.

headline.main: Cisco’s Quarterly Results Beat Analysts’ Estimates
headline.print_headline: Cisco’s Quarterly Results Beat Analysts’ Estimates
